samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example demonstrates the default functionalities of Syncfusion<sup>®</sup> TypeScript Mention component with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Multiple List
samples.description: The RequireLeadingSpace feature controls whether a leading space is needed before using Mention. When set to false, Mention works without a space; when true, a space is required for activation.
